results.name: Bisection of A112046.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a112046[n_]:=Block[{i=1}, While[JacobiSymbol[i, 2n + 1]==1, i++]; i]; Table[a112046[2n] , {n, 101}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017 *)
program: from sympy import jacobi_symbol as J
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 102)])  # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 27 2005
